longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for the period of intended stay. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required, except for Nationals of Burundi.
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold documents required for their
  next destination.
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry.



 Congo (Dem. Rep
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required.

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 1 year of age.
Recommended:
- Vaccination against yellow fever for all passengers of 9
  months of age and older, except if going to Katanga Province
  only.
  Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to P.
  falciparum, exists throughout the year in the whole country.
  Recommended prevention: C.
